sentences.en: ...a misleadingly violent trailer for the film.
sentences.cn: …一个让人误以为充斥暴力的电影预告片。

sentences.en: a car towing a trailer with a boat on it
sentences.cn: 拖着一辆载有小船的拖车的小汽车

sentences.en: Before driving away, re-check the trailer coupling.
sentences.cn: 开走之前，再检查一下拖车的挂钩。

sentences.en: Crown variegated green, white and pink , plain , ovate. Semiminiature trailer.
sentences.cn: 绿色, 白色,粉红色组合成的皇冠状斑叶, 叶面平坦. 半迷你悬垂型.

sentences.en: Have oil tank semi - trailer model and chemical liquid tank truck model.
sentences.cn: 有运油半挂车、化工液体运输等车型.

sentences.en: He transports his boat by putting it on a trailer behind his car.
sentences.cn: 他将小艇放在汽车后面的拖车上运输.

sentences.en: I watched a trailer for the screenplay of his memoirs.
sentences.cn: 我看过以他的回忆录改编成电影的预告片.

sentences.en: In order that the recorded block of data be identified, a header and trailer are added.
sentences.cn: 为了辨别所记录的数据块, 还要加上头标和尾标.

sentences.en: Serving meatloaf to truckers and living in a Kansas trailer park?
sentences.cn: 给货车司机端夹肉面包,睡堪萨斯车场的拖车?

sentences.en: The car was pulling a trailer, which carried a boat.
sentences.cn: 那部车拉着一辆拖车, 拖车上又载着一只船.

sentences.en: The tractor took up the slack and pulled the trailer out of the mud.
sentences.cn: 拖拉机拉紧拖缆把拖车从泥中拉了出来.

sentences.en: They detached their trailer and set up camp.
sentences.cn: 他们卸下拖车,架起帐篷.

sentences.en: They packed the food and camping equipment in the trailer.
sentences.cn: 他们把食物和野营用具都装上拖车上了.

sentences.en: Tubes are generally mounted on truck - trailer chassis, referred to as tube trailers.
sentences.cn: 管道一般是安装在拖车底座上, 称作管道拖车.

sentences.en: Why did you bring a rainbow trout into the trailer?
sentences.cn: 那你为什么把一条彩虹鲑鱼带到拖车里来?

words.tran_cn: 后面的；拖尾的；牵引的；被拖动的；蔓延的
[车辆]拖车；[电视]预告片；追踪者

phrases.tran_cn: 挂车制动器；超速制动器
[美]活动住屋或（家庭拖车的）停车场

trans.tran_cn: 拖车，追踪者，<美>拖车式活动房屋，（电影或电视节目的）预告片
trans.tran_en: a vehicle that can be pulled behind another vehicle, used for carrying something heavy

trans.tran_cn: 乘拖车式活动房屋旅行
